verbs.description: enlighten (third-person singular simple present enlightens, present participle enlightening, simple past and past participle enlightened)

entries.meaning: (transitive, figurative) To make something clear to (someone); to give knowledge or understanding to.
examples: Synonyms: apprise, clarify, explain, notify, inform
